turns.content:
You will now act as a prompt generator for a generative AI called "Midjourney". Midjourney AI generates images based on given prompts. 

I will provide a concept and you will provide the prompt for Midjourney AI.

You will never alter the structure and formatting outlined below in any way and obey the following guidelines:

You will not write the words "description" or use ":" in any form. Never place a comma between [ar] and [v]. 

You will write each prompt in one line without using return.

Structure:
[1] = cat
[2] = a detailed description of [1] that will include very specific imagery details.
[3] = with a detailed description describing the environment of the scene.
[4] = with a detailed description describing the mood/feelings and atmosphere of the scene.
[5] = A style, for example: photography, painting, illustration, sculpture, Artwork, paperwork, 3d and more). [1] 
[6] = A description of how [5] will be realized. (e.g. Photography (e.g. Macro, Fisheye Style, Portrait) with camera model and appropriate camera settings, Painting with detailed descriptions about the materials and working material used, rendering with engine settings, a digital Illustration, a woodburn art (and everything else that could be defined as an output type)
[ar] = "--ar 16:9" if the image looks best horizontally, "--ar 9:16" if the image looks best vertically, "--ar 1:1" if the image looks best in a square. (Use exactly as written)
[v] = If [5] looks best in a Japanese art style use, "--niji". Otherwise use, "--v 4" (Use exactly as written)

Formatting: 
What you write will be exactly as formatted in the structure below, including the "/" and ":"
This is the prompt structure: "/imagine prompt: [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [ar] [v]".

This is your task: You will generate 4 prompts for each concept [1], and each of your prompts will be a different approach in its description, environment, atmosphere, and realization.

The prompts you provide will be in English.

Please pay attention:
- Concepts that can't be real would not be described as "Real" or "realistic" or "photo" or a "photograph". for example, a concept that is made of paper or scenes which are fantasy related.
- One of the prompts you generate for each concept must be in a realistic photographic style. you should also choose a lens type and size for it. Don't choose an artist for the realistic photography prompts.
- Separate the different prompts with two new lines지금 번역하기

/imagine prompt: Cat, a close-up view of its fur and whiskers, with a detailed description of the light reflecting off the individual strands of hair. The cat is in a cozy home environment, lying on a plush cushion near a sunny window. The atmosphere is calm and peaceful, with the sound of birds chirping outside. Photography (Macro lens) with natural light and a shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9 --v 4

/imagine prompt: Cat, a detailed description of its eyes, with a focus on the shape, color, and expression. The cat is in a cluttered environment, surrounded by toys and other objects. The atmosphere is playful and mischievous, with the cat looking like it's about to pounce. Digital illustration with a vibrant color palette and bold brush strokes. --ar 1:1 --v 4

/imagine prompt: Cat, a full-body view of a majestic black cat, with a detailed description of its posture and muscular physique. The cat is outdoors, sitting on a stone wall overlooking a city skyline at sunset. The atmosphere is serene and powerful, with the cat exuding confidence and grace. Oil painting with rich, deep colors and bold brush strokes. --ar 9:16 --v 4

/imagine prompt: Cat, a surrealistic depiction of a cat floating in mid-air, surrounded by a swirling vortex of colors and patterns. The environment is abstract and psychedelic, with no clear reference points. The atmosphere is dreamlike and otherworldly, with the cat appearing both playful and mystical. 3D digital art with bright, neon colors and fluid, organic shapes. --ar 1:1 --niji

/imagine prompt: Cat, a portrait of a fluffy white cat, with a detailed description of the texture and volume of its fur. The cat is in a minimalistic environment, sitting on a white background. The atmosphere is calm and tranquil, with the cat looking directly at the viewer. Realistic photography (Portrait lens) with a soft lighting setup and a neutral color palette. --ar 4:3 --v 4

/imagine prompt: Cat, a detailed description of a cat's paw, with a focus on the intricate patterns and softness of the paw pads. The cat is in a natural environment, resting on a patch of grass. The atmosphere is peaceful and soothing, with the sound of a gentle breeze rustling the leaves. Watercolor painting with soft, muted colors and delicate brush strokes. --ar 16:9 --v 4

/imagine prompt: Cat, a silhouette of a cat perched on a windowsill, with a detailed description of the shadows and highlights of its outline. The cat is indoors, with a streetlight casting a warm glow through the window. The atmosphere is quiet and introspective, with the cat seeming to contemplate the world outside. Paper cut-out art with intricate details and a bold, graphic style. --ar 1:1 --v 4

/imagine prompt: Cat, a scene featuring a cat and a mouse sharing a bowl of milk, with a detailed description of the comical expressions and body language of both animals. The environment is a cartoonish representation of a kitchen, with exaggerated proportions and bright colors. The atmosphere is lighthearted and playful, with the cat and mouse seeming to enjoy each other's company. Digital painting with a bold, whimsical style and vibrant colors. --ar 16:9 --v 4
